notes: This map illustrates area of IDP shelter changes within the area of Baidoa, Somalia occurring between 21 August 2013 and 8 February 2014 as seen in satellite imagery collected by the Pleiades satellite. There were significant increases in the IDP areas during this time due to the 20 IDP sites that appeared and the 14 IDP sites that were expanded during the analysis period. The 78 IDP areas occupy an area of approximately 38.76 ha, which represent an increase of 0.48 ha since the previous analysis. This is a preliminary analysis and has not yet been validated in the field. Please send ground feedback to UNITAR / UNOSAT.
